text: Furthermore , injection of <extra_id_0> IL-4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> into wild-type B6 mice decreased the inducible or natural Treg number in vivo .
A distinction of the Treg subsets is not possible , because recently activated iTreg cells also express surface <extra_id_0> CD25 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .

We used complexes of recombinant mouse <extra_id_0> IL-4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> rmIL-4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) plus anti - <extra_id_0> IL-4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> monoclonal antibodies ( mAbs ) , which have been shown to dramatically increase the potency of the cytokine in vivo [ 19 ] .

In these mice , the percentage of <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + <extra_id_0> CD25 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + and <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + T cells dramatically decreased when the antibody-cytokine immune complexes were injected ( Figure S2 ) .

Upon administration of <extra_id_0> rmIL-4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> plus anti - <extra_id_0> IL-4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mAb complexes , the total number of <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + <extra_id_0> CD25 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + T cell , as well as the <extra_id_0> Foxp3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + T cells diminished by half ( Figure S2G and S2H ) , confirming that the lower percentage was not due to an increase in the <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + <extra_id_0> CD25 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - cells , but a real decrease of <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + <extra_id_0> CD25 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + T cells .
In conclusion , <extra_id_0> IL-4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> negatively regulates the natural or inducible Treg cell turnover not only in vitro but also in vivo .

To study the effects of <extra_id_0> IL-4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> on already-existing human natural or inducible Treg cells , we exposed sorted <extra_id_0> CD25 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + T cells ( nTreg cells ) to <extra_id_0> IL-4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and analyzed <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> expression and suppressive capacity .
